attributes.about_this_biz_history: Tanglebank Gardens started as a small family business growing perennials and showcasing them in our display gardens.  Over  the years we continued to grow and in 2000 we added the gift store, in 2012 we built Brambles Bistro on site with Daughter Chef Kayla and Executive Chef Sarah at the helm. Daughter and Horticulturalist Lauren grows and maintains the vegetable gardens and orchard as well as the display gardens.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Brambles Bistro specializes in Rustic West Coast farm to plate cuisine.  Our Executive Chef creates delicious breakfast, brunch and lunch creations using our own seasonal fruits and veg grown right outside our back door.  Wander the gardens at Tanglebank  and see for yourself our home grown goodness!  Then pick up some herbs, fruits and flowering plants in the garden store and create your own tasty goodness.  Your Source for Food, Flora and Fun.  Also check out the gift store for unique one of a kind gifts, and Watch for  our Seasonal Christmas Store featuring Handmade German Christmas Ornaments.

Business Excellence Award winner

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: The Palm Cafe offers a variety of specialty coffees, waffles, avocado toast & sandwiches. We bring a California feel to Abbotsford. We would love to see you.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Mucho Burrito is a fresh Mexican grill providing Mexican inspired food that feels good! We provide real good food that tastes good and is made by hand, in house, right in front of you. Visit Mucho Burrito to try our flavourful salsas made with fresh ingredients and traditional fire-roasted cooking techniques. Our guacamole is prepared FRESH with Mucho love on-site daily. Our meats are prepared with real Mexican seasoning that brings the flavour. We grill our meats in house daily, right in front of you! SO THERE YOU GO, MUCHO GOOD, MUCHO FRESH. Mexican-inspired food you love to share with your familia or amigos. (That's family and friends, in case you're really weak at Spanish.)

Meet your friends, enjoy great food and try your luck at slots, electronic table games or bingo - we've got everything you need for a fun night out. Looking for a FREE meeting/event room for your group or a Fundraiser we are the place to come in the Fraser Valley.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: In 1958, two brothers borrowed $600 from their mom to open a pizza place in Wichita, Kansas. They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Get 50% off some of your favourite regular priced medium pizzas: Hawaiian, Pepperoni Lover's, Canadian, and Margherita pizzas. Online Only. Limited Time.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: We opened our doors on August 2, 1996 and have continued meeting interesting people everyday.  Thank you for your support.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
New Saigon has been offering classic, modern, and authentic Vietnamese cuisine at value prices to Abbotsford residents since our door first opened in 1995. Try house specialities such as Coconut Curry Stew to our renowned Hot Pot Soup. We are confident you will find yourself immersed in rich and irresistible flavours while in a warm and friendly setting.

We invite you to bring your family and friends to our restaurant for that next special occasion, family gathering, or when you're just in the mood for something different. In addition we cater to all parties and business functions when you're looking to impress those hard to please guests.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Today, the privately-owned Greek Islands Restaurants is based in Abbotsford, Chilliwack & Surrey BC, is operated by George and Gus Sahamis with their sons, nephews and son in law, Yianni #1, Niko, Christo, Yianni #3, and Yianni #4 with two locations in Abbotsford, one in Chilliwack and one in Surrey.

Greek Islands Restaurants are known for outstanding food, service and atmosphere where people go to be treated like family, to be entertained, and to truly feel like your on vacation in Greece.

Greek Islands Restaurants would like to extend a warm "Thank you" to all of our guests for their continued support and patronage.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
It all began with two 16-year old twin Greek brothers, in pursuit of adventure and their dreams, migrating to Canada to share their passion for quality souvlakis and gyros and a hospitality that warms your heart.

This became the benchmark of their success as they opened their first restaurant in 1982 in Abbotsford called Golphis Steak & Pizza which was the start of something special. At only the age of 24 the brothers turned a restaurant that was run down into one of the most successful restaurant in Abbotsford with a dedication to quality & hospitality.

Based in Abbotsford, Chilliwack and Surrey BC, the restaurants are operated by George and Gus Sahamis with their sons, nephews and son in law, Yianni #1, Niko, Christo, Yianni #3, and Yianni #4, Mike and Yianni #2.

They are known for outstanding food quality, hospitality, professional service and atmosphere where people are treated like Greek gods.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Family-owned Greek Islands Restaurants is based in Abbotsford (2 locations), Chilliwack & Surrey BC, and is known for outstanding Greek food, service and atmosphere where people go to be treated like family, to be entertained, and to truly feel like you're on vacation in Greece.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Gian is the name of our grandfather he started the business in 1940 in India.  After we moved to Canada in 1988 we decided to open up a restaurant in Abbotsford and have not looked back ever since.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Gian's Indian Cuisine was voted one of top two Indian restaurant in all of BC on Urban Spoon, by our customers

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Nguyen has been a dedicated Vietnamese all her life :) .  
Having came to Canada as one of the group of Boat People refugee, she aspires to share her culture and food in gratitude for the opportunity a given to her.

Nguyen raised 3 boys in traditional Vietnamese fashion with lots of love and affection.  The all grew up to remember her constantly working hard in the kitchen preparing meals, and working throughout the night sewing as an independent work from home seamstress.  They have all grown up into good kids, and she's extremely proud of them.  Ask her about them, and she will talk to you all day about them.  You have been warned.

You can find this dedicated individual at counter everyday except for Monday.  If you see her there on Monday, tell her its her day off please!

Written by her son.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: With seven years and counting at our current location, we aspire to be a permanent fixture in the community, and deliver healthy Vietnamese soul food.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Pho Abbotsford #1 Vietnamese Noodle House makes exceptionally delicious Vietnamese food.

Our food is greatly admired for the fresh ingredients, plenty of herbs, vegetables, and keen focus on healthy good taste.  

With the balance between fresh herbs and meats and a selective use of spices to reach a fine taste, Vietnamese food is considered one of the healthiest cuisines worldwide.

Our Vietnamese owned and operated noodle house brings delicious food we grew up to your table.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: A pretty interesting guy. Full of insight and wisdom.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Got started because of a cup of tea in India. Feel free to ask me about it!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We welcome everyone with love. Come check out our chai latte, unique and one of a kind; it's pretty darn good!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Worked in the restaurant industry my whole life (since I was 14 years old) and always aspired to have my very own restaurant one day! So, at the end of 2014 my wish came true and here we are today! I welcome all of you to come and get to know me, our food and all the people who make it possible to continue on in our restaurant journey.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
New ownership! New ownership, we have taken over the reigns and Reconstructed the menu, branding and design as of Nov.20/2014! A freshly renovated space with a fresh new team who are of authentic thai/laos backgrounds.
Come check out the new renovations that will be happening this year... I’ll give you a hint... a live greenery wall!!!! You’ll be very impressed. We’ve been voted number 1 Thai restaurant in Abbotsford the last four years and we’re very proud to serve Abbotsford and surrounding areas, and even visitors to our city!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Voted 4 years in a row as Abbotsford’s “Favourite Thai Restaurant”! Come on in and complement your meal with fun, tasty Thai cocktails and a whole new team of staff to create the most desirable experience. With our calming ambiance, great food, and just a good-feel place to have a classy date, or a chill out evening with your friends and family. Newly renovated and fresh, new items weekly! We are now also using “Skip the Dishes” for our delivery for all of Abbotsford to sit back and relax and enjoy their take out!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: As a family business, King Kabob restaurant has been an inspiration for us to bring an authentic quality Persian and Middle-eastern halal grill to Abbotsford and share its story, joy, and experience with our community. We believe in quality and we believe quality speaks for itself!!
attributes.about_this_biz_history: King Kabob restaurant opened in late 2017 in Abbotsford. we're the first and primary Middle-eastern halal Kabob house in Fraser Valley.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Best place to eat in Abbotsford, first and primary unique Kabob house in Fraser Valley. We deliver a variety of Persian and middle-eastern flame-broiled inspired halal juicy kabobs & cooking traditions.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Bhav is the owner who has been a chef for 17 years now. After grade 12 he decided to take culinary as his profession and be a chef so he started at a young age. His only passion is to make the best food and see people satisfied after a meal.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: We started this small family run business with my husband chef, having 17 years of experience. We have dine in and take out facility. Word of mouth helped us to establish our place among all the restaurants in town ..
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Best east Indian food with authentic taste ...

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Shahab is highly educated entrepreneur who has a lot of experience about pizza. When he came to Canada, he started working in popular Pizza Frenchise for 10 years. After he finished his education as an optician and even working as an optician in very popular frenchise and Brand, He decided to start his own Pizza store but the the real Italian Pizza. He wanted to deliver high quality home style Pizza to customers. for him, High quality and fresh pizza and Customer service are the priorities in his store. He took over this store in Sep 2023 and since then he did lots or improvement inside store and retrain staff to deliver high quality Pizza and Great Customer Service.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: True authentic Neapoitan pizzas made with delicious Italian cuts and local grown fresh vegetables, delivered to your door 7 days a week.

Greek Islands Restaurants are known for outstanding food, service and atmosphere where people go to be treated like family, to be entertained, and to truly feel like your on vacation in Greece.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Lance graduated from TWU in 2011 with his BBA in Corporate Finance, while playing basketball for the Spartans for five years. Upon graduation, he spent a year in the technology industry before switching gears to a successful career in the power tool industry. Lance was in industrial sales for Milwaukee Electric Tool for three years in Vancouver. With his Business degree and his experience in sales, Lance is ready and keen to make a splash in what he is passionate about: Creating BC Craft Beer. With the guidance of his father and uncle, Lance is equipped with the knowledge of previous successful start-up businesses, and excited to add Trading Post Brewing to the fantastic BC craft beer industry.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Our modern day Craft Brewery and Eateries were born out of a passion for great beer & great food. We look forward to sharing our love of fresh, local ingredients with the people in the communities we call home. We believe it's over a glass of beer and a hot meal where friendships deepen, family ties strengthen and community unites. Share tacos or poutines, or enjoy your own burger or salad. Made fresh from produce grown and animals raised right here in the Fraser Valley

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Jack Niemann started with Black Forest Restaurant in 1968. and 2001 he came with an idea , to start a schnitzel fast food chain, and he opened sold his first schnitzel franchise in East Abbotsford in Whatcom Plaza.........

and Jack Still owns 2 Fine Dining Black Forest restaurants in States.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Schnitzel Foods, schnitzel burgers, Kids Meals, Red Cabbage, Cole slaw, beer on tap, goulash soup, cordon bleu, fast service, great food, schnitzel Caesar. Best European food in town. Polish food, German food, Hungarian food, Indian Food, as we sell great Butter Chicken with rice and naan bread. located very close to exit 95, close to castle fun park and hotel ramada. lunch and dinner specials, hot dogs, chicken fingers, kids meals. Greek salad, Caesar salad, salsa schnitzel, pizza schnitzel, mushroom burger, Best beef burger in town, hand made and home made food. pork schnitzel, chicken schnitzel, turkey schnitzel, juicy beef, Canadian ham burger, fresh everyday, eat in , take out, delivery 
 
Great beer and wine variety..........

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: As a family business, King Kabob restaurant has been an inspiration for us to bring an authentic quality Persian and Middle-eastern halal grill to Abbotsford and share its story, joy, and experience with our community. We believe in quality and we believe quality speaks for itself!!
attributes.about_this_biz_history: King Kabob restaurant opened in late 2017 in Abbotsford. we're the first and primary Middle-eastern halal Kabob house in Fraser Valley.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Best place to eat in Abbotsford, first and primary unique Kabob house in Fraser Valley. We deliver a variety of Persian and middle-eastern flame-broiled inspired halal juicy kabobs & cooking traditions.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Worked in the restaurant industry my whole life (since I was 14 years old) and always aspired to have my very own restaurant one day! So, at the end of 2014 my wish came true and here we are today! I welcome all of you to come and get to know me, our food and all the people who make it possible to continue on in our restaurant journey.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
New ownership! New ownership, we have taken over the reigns and Reconstructed the menu, branding and design as of Nov.20/2014! A freshly renovated space with a fresh new team who are of authentic thai/laos backgrounds.
Come check out the new renovations that will be happening this year... I’ll give you a hint... a live greenery wall!!!! You’ll be very impressed. We’ve been voted number 1 Thai restaurant in Abbotsford the last four years and we’re very proud to serve Abbotsford and surrounding areas, and even visitors to our city!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Voted 4 years in a row as Abbotsford’s “Favourite Thai Restaurant”! Come on in and complement your meal with fun, tasty Thai cocktails and a whole new team of staff to create the most desirable experience. With our calming ambiance, great food, and just a good-feel place to have a classy date, or a chill out evening with your friends and family. Newly renovated and fresh, new items weekly! We are now also using “Skip the Dishes” for our delivery for all of Abbotsford to sit back and relax and enjoy their take out!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: A pretty interesting guy. Full of insight and wisdom.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Got started because of a cup of tea in India. Feel free to ask me about it!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We welcome everyone with love. Come check out our chai latte, unique and one of a kind; it's pretty darn good!
our speciality in indian cuisine ,indo-chinese and south indian food ,and we provide take-out ,delivery ,dine in and catering service too.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Been in the sushi industry for 30 years.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Grand Open !! Feb/1st/2022 !!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We serve both excellent Japanese and Korean food at our restaurant.
Halal Middle East Restaurant

Local family-owned Pizzeria part of great franchise, with a focus on taste and variety. With locally sourced ingredients and premium quality GMO-Free meat, our menu is filled with VEGAN, Gluten-free and fusion of Indian twist like butter chicken pizza, chicken tikka masala pizza, and paneer tikka masala pizza, each bursting with authentic Indian spices fusion. Menu options, go beyond pizza, offering pasta, chicken wings, sliders, and desserts to satisfy all your cravings.
Serving Abbotsford for 29 years

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Shahab is highly educated entrepreneur who has a lot of experience about pizza. When he came to Canada, he started working in popular Pizza Frenchise for 10 years. After he finished his education as an optician and even working as an optician in very popular frenchise and Brand, He decided to start his own Pizza store but the the real Italian Pizza. He wanted to deliver high quality home style Pizza to customers. for him, High quality and fresh pizza and Customer service are the priorities in his store. He took over this store in Sep 2023 and since then he did lots or improvement inside store and retrain staff to deliver high quality Pizza and Great Customer Service.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: True authentic Neapoitan pizzas made with delicious Italian cuts and local grown fresh vegetables, delivered to your door 7 days a week.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Bhav is the owner who has been a chef for 17 years now. After grade 12 he decided to take culinary as his profession and be a chef so he started at a young age. His only passion is to make the best food and see people satisfied after a meal.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: We started this small family run business with my husband chef, having 17 years of experience. We have dine in and take out facility. Word of mouth helped us to establish our place among all the restaurants in town ..
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Best east Indian food with authentic taste ...
Hong dynasty gggg

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Home of Insanely Delicious Gourmet Burgers in Canada, with 12 locations across British Columbia. Dine-in with us, order take-out, or get delivery via your favourite app. From Fire-Grilled Burgers to Bottomless Sides to Delicious Desserts, we have the perfect YUMMM order waiting for you.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Home of Insanely Delicious Gourmet Burgers in Canada, with 12 locations across British Columbia. attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Since 1997, our family has been making pizza from premium ingredients for your family to take home and enjoy life's great moments. It's an opportunity to cherish.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: With an extensive background in the pizza industry Ricardo wanted to serve pizza with the freshest and highest quality ingredients. Ricardo's Pizza takes great pride in providing the highest level of service to its customers in the Abbotsford and Chilliwack areas. Ricardo's Pizza was voted to Abbotsford's "A-List" in one local newspaper and Abbotsford's "Best List" in another.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We pride ourselves in being a family owned and community driven pizza shop. Our authentic ingredients are all fresh and made on location. By focusing on quality in every order of pizza, pasta, wings, ribs or side orders we have been recognized as the Best Pizza Place in Abbotsford.
Please try out our Vietnamese Sandwiches. We prepare our dishes from the scratch. You won't forget the fantastic tastes.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Childhood friends who works in hospitality industry for more then 15 years in all around the world.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Masala Art is dream of two childhood friends , who having more then 15 years experience in hospitality industry.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Punjabi street food, Curries , Snacks, Tandoori Dishes,Breads sweets and Drinks

"Every pizza at PBX1 PIZZA & GRILL is a masterpiece, carefully curated to satisfy diverse palates. From classic Margherita to bold BBQ Chicken, each slice is an experience that speaks volumes. Our commitment to using only the freshest ingredients ensures that every bite bursts with authentic taste with this we believe in providing quality to all our lovely customers. Do visit our pizza store and enjoy the best pizza flavor in Abby."

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Born and raised in Abbotsford, Chris fell in love with the Pita Pit product and concept while attending university at UBC. After completing his BA he decided it was time Abbotsford had a Pita Pit of it's own.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Serving Abbotsford with the best healthy fast meal options since 2003!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Over 25 different pitas in two size offerings to please vegetarians and meat eaters alike. Make any pita a salad. Five delicious smoothie flavours. Variety of hot and cold beverages, snacks and cookies!

name: The Real Taste of Mother's Hand

attributes.about_this_biz_history: We have been providing live fire onsite catering  for Weddings, Corporate events, Movie production, Festivals, And large private parties for over 10 years. We pride ourselves on using  local high quality ingriediants when ever possible.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Real Southern live fore BBQ catering. We specializing in Pulled pork, Ribs, Chicken, Brisket, Whole hog and Prime Rib. We bring our Ole Hickory Pits Smoker to your event and cook on site. Corporate Events, Weddings,  Impress your clients by partnering with Porkmafia to make your occasion a success and one that will not be forgotten.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: In 1958, two brothers borrowed $600 from their mom to open a pizza place in Wichita, Kansas. They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Get 50% off some of your favourite regular priced medium pizzas: Hawaiian, Pepperoni Lover's, Canadian, and Margherita pizzas. Online Only. Limited Time.
Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Visit our Firehouse Subs restaurant in Abbotsford. Our sandwich shop specializes in hot subs made with premium meats and cheeses, steamed to perfection, then piled high on a toasted private recipe roll. Our menu will surely satisfy your appetite! Founded by Firemen. We are passionate about giving back to our communities through our flavourful food and heartfelt service. Takeout, delivery, and catering services are available.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Been in the Thai Express family for over 10 years.
I believe that healthy eating is important, that's why I do what I do! Making fresh and delicious tasting food!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Come try our exotic tasting Thai Food! We provide gluten-free, as well as vegetarian options. Offering variety of meats and vegetables, make your dish how you want it!

A social enterprise, Taste of Heaven delivers delicious street style food to special functions, job sites and festivals all over Metro Vancouver. Taste of Heaven serves the perfect street fare: locally made gourmet sausages, served on a bun with freshly prepared condiments, locally crafted potato chips and hand-brewed sodas.

Every meal purchased at Taste of Heaven helps NightShift Street Ministries reach out to people battling life's toughest situations: homelessness, addiction, mental illness and poverty.
Meats and deli serving meats and deli

Fresh sandwiches

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Pam is the overseer of the Cafe here in Abbotsford as well as runs training for other cafes to start!

name: A & M European Deli & Catering Service

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Tanglebank Gardens started as a small family business growing perennials and showcasing them in our display gardens.  Over  the years we continued to grow and in 2000 we added the gift store, in 2012 we built Brambles Bistro on site with Daughter Chef Kayla and Executive Chef Sarah at the helm. Daughter and Horticulturalist Lauren grows and maintains the vegetable gardens and orchard as well as the display gardens.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Brambles Bistro specializes in Rustic West Coast farm to plate cuisine.  Our Executive Chef creates delicious breakfast, brunch and lunch creations using our own seasonal fruits and veg grown right outside our back door.  Wander the gardens at Tanglebank  and see for yourself our home grown goodness!  Then pick up some herbs, fruits and flowering plants in the garden store and create your own tasty goodness.  Your Source for Food, Flora and Fun.  Also check out the gift store for unique one of a kind gifts, and Watch for  our Seasonal Christmas Store featuring Handmade German Christmas Ornaments.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
On Abbotsford A- List for 16years
Business Excellence Award winner

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: The Palm Cafe offers a variety of specialty coffees, waffles, avocado toast & sandwiches. We bring a California feel to Abbotsford. We would love to see you.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Mucho Burrito is a fresh Mexican grill providing Mexican inspired food that feels good! We provide real good food that tastes good and is made by hand, in house, right in front of you. Visit Mucho Burrito to try our flavourful salsas made with fresh ingredients and traditional fire-roasted cooking techniques. Our guacamole is prepared FRESH with Mucho love on-site daily. Our meats are prepared with real Mexican seasoning that brings the flavour. We grill our meats in house daily, right in front of you! SO THERE YOU GO, MUCHO GOOD, MUCHO FRESH. Mexican-inspired food you love to share with your familia or amigos. (That's family and friends, in case you're really weak at Spanish.)

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Lance graduated from TWU in 2011 with his BBA in Corporate Finance, while playing basketball for the Spartans for five years. Upon graduation, he spent a year in the technology industry before switching gears to a successful career in the power tool industry. Lance was in industrial sales for Milwaukee Electric Tool for three years in Vancouver. With his Business degree and his experience in sales, Lance is ready and keen to make a splash in what he is passionate about: Creating BC Craft Beer. With the guidance of his father and uncle, Lance is equipped with the knowledge of previous successful start-up businesses, and excited to add Trading Post Brewing to the fantastic BC craft beer industry.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Our modern day Craft Brewery and Eateries were born out of a passion for great beer & great food. We look forward to sharing our love of fresh, local ingredients with the people in the communities we call home. We believe it's over a glass of beer and a hot meal where friendships deepen, family ties strengthen and community unites. Share tacos or poutines, or enjoy your own burger or salad. Made fresh from produce grown and animals raised right here in the Fraser Valley
